ModMetaData.name: The Birds and the Bees - CF Patch
ModMetaData.author: Dr_Zhivago
ModMetaData.description: Adds reproductive organs for "The Birds and the Bees" with prosthetics based on "Cyber Fauna". Load after "Cyber Fauna" and "The Birds and the Bees" Features - Adds simple (80% efficiency) and bionic (125% efficiency) reproductive organs for animals. Restores fertility. - Also works with derivative mods such as "The Birds and the Bees - RBSE Edition" Known issues - No known issues. Save compatible.
